content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
Voice message
content.question: What caused the change of plans?

choices.label: A change in a class schedule
The need to borrow a book
The need to stay up late studying

content.answer: The need to borrow a book

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
